Uses of Package
org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

  • Packages that use org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation
    Contains all classes to activate the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-annotation.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.elements
    Contains the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin elements interfaces to use in the callbacks and events.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.listeners
    Contains all callback interfaces to implement for the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.events
    Contains all events to interact with chart instance.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation used by org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation 
    Class Description
    AbstractAnnotation
    Base class to define an annotation in the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    It contains all commons properties to define an annotation.
    AbstractAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AbstractBoxedLabel
    Implements a LABEL to apply on a LINE annotation.
    AbstractBoxedLabel.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options for annotation which are configured by a point and with a radius in a chart.
    AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AbstractPointedAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options for annotation which are configured by a point in a chart.
    AbstractPointedAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AlignPosition
    This object is to set the position of a label, setting the horizontal and vertical position.
    AlignPosition.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Animations
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin options where to set all configuration related to annotation animations.
    AnnotationContext
    The callback or handler context wrapper, created and passed by AnnotationPlugin.ID which contains the link to the native chart.
    AnnotationContext.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AnnotationElementFactory
    Specific base element factory for Annotation plugin elements, related to the annotation types.
    AnnotationHelper
    Helpers to provides utilities in the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    AnnotationId
    Represents the annotation id of a annotation configuration object in the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    AnnotationMap
    Object which stores all annotations by their ID in the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    AnnotationOptions
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin options where to set all configuration items needed to the plugin.
    AnnotationOptions.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    AnnotationOptionsFactory
    Factory to get the options (from chart) related to AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    AnnotationOptionsFactory.AnnotationDefaultsOptionsFactory
    Internal factory to create options from default global option for the plugin
    AnnotationPlugin
    Entry point of ANNOTATION plugin to enable the plugin.
    The ANNOTATION plugin draws lines and boxes on the chart area.
    The ANNOTATION plugin plugin works with line, bar, scatter and bubble charts that use linear, logarithmic, time, or category scales.
    The ANNOTATION plugin plugin will not work on any chart that does not have exactly two axes, including pie, radar, and polar area charts.
    AnnotationPluginResource
    Contains the content of chartjs-plugin-annotation.min.js to inject.
    AnnotationSharedObjects
    Stores and maintains shared object that user can use by AnnotationContext.
    AnnotationType
    Defines the type of annotation.
    Arrow
    Implements a ARROWHEADS, and its start and end nodes, to apply on a LINE annotation.
    Arrow.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    ArrowHeads
    Implements a ARROWHEADS to apply on a LINE annotation.
    ArrowHeads.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BackgroundColorHandler
    Base object to map the background color options.
    BackgroundColorHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BorderOptionsHandler
    Base object to map the border options.
    BorderOptionsHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BorderRadiusHandler
    Base object to map the border radius options.
    BorderRadiusHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BoxAnnotation
    Implements a BOX annotation which draws a box in the a chart.
    If one of the axes is not specified, the box will take the entire chart dimension.
    The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
    BoxAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BoxLabel
    Implements a LABEL to apply on a BOX annotation.
    Callout
    Implements a CALLOUT to apply on a LABEL annotation.
    Callout.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    ControlPoint
    This object is to set the control point of a line annotation, when set as curve.
    If curve is enabled, it configures the control point to drawn the curve, calculated in pixels.
    It can be set by a string in percentage format "number%" which are representing the percentage of the distance between the start and end point from the center.
    ControlPoint.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    DefaultAlignPosition
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin align position DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultArrow
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation ARROWHEADS options.
    DefaultArrowHeads
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation ARROWHEADS options.
    DefaultBox
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultBoxLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultCallout
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin CALLOUT of LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultEllipse
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultEllipseLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultInteraction
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin DEFAULTS for interaction options.
    DefaultLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultLine
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultLineLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultOptions
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin DEFAULTS for main options.
    DefaultOptions.DefaultAnnotationAnimations
    This class is implementing the default of Annotation plugin animations.
    DefaultPoint
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options.
    DefaultPolygon
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POLYGON annotation DEFAULTS options.
    EllipseAnnotation
    Implements a ELLIPSE annotation which draws a ellipse in the a chart.
    If one of the axes is not specified, the ellipse will take the entire chart dimension.
    The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
    EllipseAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    EllipseLabel
    Implements a LABEL to apply on a ELLIPSE annotation.
    EventsHandler
    Base object to map the events callbacks options.
    EventsHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    ExtendedBorderOptionsHandler
    Base object to map the extended border options.
    ExtendedBorderOptionsHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    ExtendedShadowOptionsHandler
    Base object to map the shadow options.
    ExtendedShadowOptionsHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Font
    Base object to map font options for AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin for label configuration.
    HasBackgroundColor
    Interface to map the background color options.
    HasBorderOptions
    Interface to map the border options options.
    HasBorderRadius
    Interface to map the border radius options.
    HasEventsHandler
    Interface to map the event callbacks options.
    HasExtendedBorderOptions
    Interface to map the extended border options options.
    HasExtendedShadowOptions
    Interface to map the extended shadow options.
    HasLabel
    Interface to map the label options.
    HasRotation
    Interface to map the rotation options.
    HasShadowOptions
    Interface to map the shadow options.
    HasTextStrokeOptions
    Interface to map the text stroke options options.
    InnerLabel
    base object to map all label options for instances which belongs to another container.
    InnerLabel.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Interaction
    Definitions about how the user can interact with chart elements.
    Interaction.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    IsDefaultsAbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options interface for annotation which are configured by a point and radius in a chart.
    IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options interface for annotation which are configured by a point in a chart.
    IsDefaultsAlignPosition
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin align position DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsAnnotationInteraction
    Interface to define interaction object defaults on annotations.
    IsDefaultsAnnotationOptions
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin DEFAULTS options interface, in order to define the attributes of main annotations options.
    IsDefaultsArrow
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation ARROW HEADS options.
    IsDefaultsArrowHeads
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation ARROW HEADS options.
    IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides background color property.
    IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides border properties.
    IsDefaultsBorderRadiusHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides border radius property.
    IsDefaultsBoxAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsBoxLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsCallout
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin CALLOUT of LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsEllipseAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsEllipseLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsEventsHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides events callbacks.
    IsDefaultsExtendedBorderOptionsHandler
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin extended border DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsExtendedShadowOptionsHandler
    This is the default extended options for items which provides shadow properties.
    IsDefaultsInnerLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin inner LABEL of annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsLabelAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsLabelHandler
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL handler DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsLineAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LINE annotation DEFAULTS options interface.
    IsDefaultsLineLabel
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
    IsDefaultsPointAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options interface.
    IsDefaultsPolygonAnnotation
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options interface.
    IsDefaultsRotationHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides rotation property.
    IsDefaultsShadowOptionsHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides shadow properties.
    IsDefaultsTextStrokeOptionsHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides text stroke properties.
    IsLabelContainer
    Interface to map the annotation which contains the label options.
    LabelAnnotation
    Implements a LABEL annotation which draws a content in the a chart.
    LabelAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    LabelHandler
    Manages the common labels options among the annotations and labels.
    LabelHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    LineAnnotation
    Implements a LINE annotation which draws a line in the a chart.
    LineAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    LineLabel
    Implements a LABEL to apply on a LINE annotation.
    LineLabel.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Padding
    Base object to map padding options for AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin padding configuration.
    It is applied to all sides of the label (left, top, right, bottom).
    PointAnnotation
    Implements a POINT annotation which draws a point in the a chart.
    PointAnnotation.InternalPointStyleHandler
    Internal class to implement a point style handler.
    PointAnnotation.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    PolygonAnnotation
    Implements a POLYGON annotation which draws a polygon in the a chart.

    Name of properties of native object.

  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation used by org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.elements 
    Class Description
    AnnotationEnvelop
    This object is a container of hidden object to pass to other packages.
    It can not be instantiated in order that public methods can be invoked in safe mode.
    ControlPoint
    This object is to set the control point of a line annotation, when set as curve.
    If curve is enabled, it configures the control point to drawn the curve, calculated in pixels.
    It can be set by a string in percentage format "number%" which are representing the percentage of the distance between the start and end point from the center.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation used by org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.listeners 
    Class Description
    AnnotationContext
    The callback or handler context wrapper, created and passed by AnnotationPlugin.ID which contains the link to the native chart.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation used by org.pepstock.charba.client.events 
    Class Description
    AnnotationEnvelop
    This object is a container of hidden object to pass to other packages.
    It can not be instantiated in order that public methods can be invoked in safe mode.
